name: Goblin Gold Mine
description:
With the Goblin King dead, who decides how to split up the gold?
You! And every other Goblin in the place... Best be sure to take care of them first.

Goblin Gold Mine is a multiplayer archery game where up to 12 players are dumped in a battle ground to see who gets to 5 kills first, but be careful! When you die, your kills gets reset to 0. Nada. Zip. You'll have to climb that ladder all over.

Be the first to claim victory and the gold shall be yours!*

This game uses Unity's included networking, and therefore I have to charge for it. Sorry, but if I get too many people on at once, either I pay more or you get kicked. The price is currently only $2, but will be going up when final release rocks around. So get in quick!

Please also note that because this is a Beta, I haven't fully implemented some features. You will need to press Alt + F4 (or Cmd + Q for Macs) to quit!!

*gold not included in this build of the game.
